CSubMesh
public
ISubMesh

CRefCount
CSubMesh

Defines a submesh. A submesh is a child of a mesh object and contains the actual mesh data (collection of vertices and edges).

Functions
Normalize
virtual void Normalize(
const BBox3 &bbox
) override

See ISubMesh::Normalize

Triangulate
virtual void Triangulate(
ETriangulateMethod method
) override

Converts a mesh from arbitrary polygons into a triangulated mesh.

Parameters
method
ETriangulateMethod

method to use for triangulation

CMesh
public
IMesh
public
CRefCount
CMesh

Defines a mesh. A mesh object is simply a collection of submesh objects (ISubMesh). To convert this mesh into a renderable form the client should call <MeshToD3D>.
